message: Signed the papers on my house in the Mississippi district. Woot! Now I'm not just a renting vagrant hippie!
Welcome to the neighborhood! :)
@selenamarie Random question, since you're in the neighborhood... have you ever seen somebody go door-to-door selling honey?
i'm buying a house in portland right now too @mtrichardson
@mtrichardson lol! no, but we get lots of people selling tamales. i sometimes give away eggs, but mostly just to my immediate neighbors. :)
@takeo Congrats - I didn't realize you were moving up. Which neighborhood?
@takeo Awesome!
@cscotta alameda, it's like 25th and skidmore
we won't be up there till around the middle of march
@takeo @mtrichardson we should have a progressive dinner, or a bike posse dinner. we're a healthy stumbling distance of each other.
@takeo 11th and shaver! and march is better for this type of thing anyway. too cold right now!
the neighborhood seems awesome for our little girl
totally! there are great parks all around. my running route takes me by 4, and there are at least 2-3 more nearby.
oh, where are you @selenamarie
oh nice, that is pretty close :)
yeah we're stoked
also, there were 3 tetherball stands on the sidewalks last year. we'll see if they come out again this summer.
heh, well my lil girl is only 3 so no thetherball yet. but she loves parks, and we actually will have a yard now!
I'm at Skidmore and Haight. Go neighborhood!
nice :)
We just closed on our house today, finally :)
Congrats, Toby. Thomas mentioned you'd be heading up soon -- that's great to hear!
